mapper.select: SELECT s.* FROM schedule s JOIN member m ON s.trainer_idx = m.member_idx WHERE m.member_type = 'trainer' AND s.trainer_idx = #{trainerIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule ( schedule_idx, member_idx, schedule_date, schedule_stime, schedule_etime, schedule_content, schedule_regdate ) VALUES ( schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_idx}, #{schedule_date}, #{schedule_stime}, #{schedule_etime}, #{schedule_content}, SYSDATE )
